content:
The Kyiv District Administrative Court refused to satisfy the claim against the requirements set out in the project of the contract for the purchase of food for the Armed Forces.

About thisinformsMinistry of Defence Ukraine.

Among other things, the plaintiff challenged the requirements for the obligation of suppliers to register tax invoices in a timely manner and to give the customer the opportunity to check the storage conditions of food supplied to servicemen.

These requirements were set by the "state operator of the rear" (DOT) in order to attract the supply of food, virtuous suppliers, which will provide the Armed Forces with quality products.

"Today's decision of the court should be a clear force for all suppliers that the provision of the Armed Forces of Ukraine will take place according to the plan, and the efforts to disrupt the purchases will be leveled in the legal plane," - said in a state -owned enterprise.

Reference:According to the new principle of procurement of the Ministry of Defense, two state -owned enterprises were created to ensure the Armed Forces: "State Rear Operator" (DOT) and "Defense Procurement Agency" (AFO). Both agencies work according to modern corporate standards and focus on NATO -practicing approaches.

As reported by the Armyinform, DotannouncedNew purchasing procedures for food supply for the army.
